entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 this morning. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Wind west 20 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 17 February 2023
